summary: Bart Allison and sidekick Sam arrive in the town of Sundown on the wedding day of town boss Tate Kimbrough, whom Allison blames for his wife's death years earlier.

keywords: one armed gunfighter|shot in the back|revenge motive|interrupted wedding|american southwest
title: Cita en Sundown
